data.snapshot: Price fell 5.23% from the period open to 109,611, trading slightly above short-term SMAs with neutral momentum. No volume spike or sweep; intraday weakness was limited.
chronology: Last sits just above SMA8 ($109,485.67) and SMA21 ($109,432.87)
No volume spike or sweep detected; max observed drop ~0.69%
technicalReadout: Short-term SMA alignment mildly bullish (SMA8 > SMA21) but price is only marginally above them
RSI in neutral zone, no clear momentum bias
No unusual volume or sweep to validate a decisive move
Max intraday decline small (~0.69%), suggests limited flash volatility

scenarios.title: Bull / Stabilization
scenarios.text: Price holds above SMA8/21, RSI drifts above 50 and buyers push toward $112k–$116k resistance. Recovery gains credibility if accompanied by rising volume.

scenarios.title: Bear / Breakdown
scenarios.text: Failure to hold $108,963 leads to deeper test of prior support near $108k and below. Sustained selling with rising volume would target lower structure.

scenarios.title: Range / Consolidation
scenarios.text: With neutral RSI and no volume signal, expect sideways trading between $109k–$112k while indicators realign; a breakout in either direction will require volume confirmation.

checklist: For demand zone longs (~109k): wait for a bullish reaction candle + above‑average buy volume; stop under 107k.
For H&S shorts: wait for a retest of ~112–112.5k that fails and shows rejection volume; reduce size into expiries.
If price closes daily above 118k with volume, reconsider bearish sizing and prefer bullish setups.
Keep position sizing modest (1–2% capital per trade) — the structure is still corrective and volatile.
